name: BoneDevil: RPG
description:
Join The BoneDevil on their quest to bring justice to the fiend who stole all of Oshawa's whisky!

The game features a soundtrack of the band's music re-imagined into an 8-bit retro style, along with a compelling plot written by the band's bassist (completely without the knowledge or consent of the rest of the band).

Stay tuned for BoneDevil Pt. 2: RPG coming late 2015.
